solution_line_template: Since there are {sets_per_hour} sets of {set_minutes} minutes in an hour, then in {hours} hours there are {hours} x {sets_per_hour} = <<{hours}*{sets_per_hour}={total_sets}>>{total_sets} sets of {set_minutes} minutes.
Hence, a machine that Sue oversees can produce {cans_per_set} cans x {total_sets} = <<{cans_per_set}*{total_sets}={total_cans}>>{total_cans} cans of soda in {hours} hours.
